entry.title: BearConf - cheapest hostel in town is official lodging - happy meals for lunch - no venue we just get together, hack, and group at coffee shops - no p...
entry.summary: BearConf - cheapest hostel in town is official lodging - happy meals for lunch - no venue we just get together, hack, and group at coffee shops - no parties, we all just go vibe at McDonald’s every night - public goods focused - keynote speaker is @notscottmoore Who’s down?

entry.title: 🔥 lit 🔥
entry.summary: 🔥 lit 🔥 Lit Protocol: 🔥 New Post 🔥 Learn how to encrypt data using @LitProtocol, upload it to @ArweaveTeam using @BundlrNetwork, then have another user who meets access control conditions fetch and decrypt using Lit! https://blog.litprotocol.com/?p=lit-x-bundlr-x-arweave-guide
